short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Markdown Formatted Secure Notes for Bitwarden(R)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
👍Format Bitwarden(R) Secure Notes with Markdown (MD)

📌 Real-time
📌 Table of Contents (ToC) generated from Headings
📌 All links are converted automatically
📌 Add emojis using the :smiley: syntax
📌 Format notes in Logins, Cards, Identities and Secure Notes
📌 Works with any self-hosted Bitwarden(R) installation and the official vault.bitwarden.com

Disclaimer: Install at own risk. This extension renders the contents of the text input field to HTML using the "Showdown" javascript library. We did not find/observe any security issues but can not make any statements about this imported library.

This project is not associated with the Bitwarden project nor Bitwarden, Inc.
